content.text: // MainActivity.kt - Fixed version without Navigation Component package com.example.teacherscheduler import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity import android.os.Bundle import android.widget.Toast import com.example.teacherscheduler.databinding.ActivityMainBinding class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() { private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState) try { // Initialize view binding binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater) setContentView(binding.root) // Set up toolbar (if you have one) setSupportActionBar(binding.toolbar) // Simple button click listeners for testing binding.btnClasses.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Classes section clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Navigate to classes screen } binding.btnMeetings.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Meetings section clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Navigate to meetings screen } binding.btnToday.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Today's schedule clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Show today's schedule } // FAB click listener binding.fab?.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Add new item clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Show add dialog } } catch (e: Exception) { e.printStackTrace() Toast.makeText(this, "Error starting app: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show() } } } // ============================================================================ // SIMPLE LAYOUT FOR ACTIVITY_MAIN.XML // Replace your activity_main.xml with this content: // ============================================================================ /* <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".MainActivity"> <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"> <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|enterAlways" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" /> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Teacher Schedule Manager" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" /> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Quick Actions" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnClasses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Manage Classes" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnMeetings" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Manage Meetings" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnToday" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Today's Schedule" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.TonalButton" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Status" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="✅ App is working correctly!" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" /> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Ready to manage your schedule" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fab" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:srcCompat="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" /> </androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout> */

// MainActivity.kt - Fixed version without Navigation Component package com.example.teacherscheduler import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity import android.os.Bundle import android.widget.Toast import com.example.teacherscheduler.databinding.ActivityMainBinding class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() { private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState) try { // Initialize view binding binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater) setContentView(binding.root) // Set up toolbar (if you have one) setSupportActionBar(binding.toolbar) // Simple button click listeners for testing binding.btnClasses.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Classes section clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Navigate to classes screen } binding.btnMeetings.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Meetings section clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Navigate to meetings screen } binding.btnToday.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Today's schedule clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Show today's schedule } // FAB click listener binding.fab?.setOnClickListener { Toast.makeText(this, "Add new item clicked!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // TODO: Show add dialog } } catch (e: Exception) { e.printStackTrace() Toast.makeText(this, "Error starting app: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show() } } } // ============================================================================ // SIMPLE LAYOUT FOR ACTIVITY_MAIN.XML // Replace your activity_main.xml with this content: // ============================================================================ /* <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".MainActivity"> <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"> <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|enterAlways" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" /> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Teacher Schedule Manager" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" /> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Quick Actions" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnClasses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Manage Classes" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnMeetings" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Manage Meetings" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" /> <Button android:id="@+id/btnToday" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Today's Schedule" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.TonalButton" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Status" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="✅ App is working correctly!" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" /> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Ready to manage your schedule" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fab" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:srcCompat="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" /> </androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout> */

I'll help you implement the provided code for your Teacher Scheduler app. Let me analyze what we need to do.

First, I need to understand the current state of your project to properly implement the provided code.
Let me check the current structure of your project to understand what files we need to modify.
Now, let me check the current content of these files to understand what changes we need to make.
Now I need to check if the SharedViewModel exists and what it contains:
Let me also check if there are any drawable resources that we need to be aware of:

Based on the analysis, I understand that you want to simplify your app by removing the Navigation Component and implementing a simpler version with direct activity-based navigation. Let me implement the changes according to the code you provided.

First, let's update the MainActivity.kt file:
Now, let's update the activity_main.xml file:

= findViewById(R.id.drawer_layout)%0A        val toggle = ActionBarDrawerToggle(%0A            this, drawerLayout, toolbar,%0A            R.string.app_name, R.string.app_name%0A        )%0A        drawerLayout.addDrawerListener(toggle)%0A        toggle.syncState()%0A%0A        // Set up the navigation view%0A        val navView = findViewById%3CNavigationView%3E(R.id.nav_view)%0A        navView.setNavigationItemSelectedListener(this)%0A%0A        // Set up the navigation controller%0A        navController = findNavController(R.id.nav_host_fragment)%0A        appBarConfiguration = navView.setupWithNavController(navController)%0A%0A        // Set up the FAB%0A        fab = findViewById(R.id.fab)%0A        %0A        // Initialize the shared view model%0A        sharedViewModel = ViewModelProvider(this)%5BSharedViewModel::class.java%5D%0A        %0A        // Check and request notification permission for Android 13+%0A        checkNotificationPermission()%0A        %0A        // Observe FAB visibility%0A        sharedViewModel.fabVisible.observe(this) %7B visible -%3E%0A            fab.visibility = if (visible) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE%0A        %7D%0A        %0A        // Observe FAB action%0A        sharedViewModel.fabAction.observe(this) %7B action -%3E%0A            when (action) %7B%0A                SharedViewModel.FabAction.ADD_CLASS -%3E %7B%0A                    fab.setOnClickListener %7B%0A                        navController.navigate(R.id.addEditClassFragment)%0A                    %7D%0A                %7D%0A                SharedViewModel.FabAction.ADD_MEETING -%3E %7B%0A                    fab.setOnClickListener %7B%0A                        navController.navigate(R.id.addEditMeetingFragment)%0A                    %7D%0A                %7D%0A                else -%3E %7B%0A                    fab.setOnClickListener(null)%0A                %7D%0A            %7D%0A        %7D%0A    %7D%0A%0A    override fun MenuItem): Boolean %7B%0A        when (item.itemId) %7B%0A            R.id.nav_dashboard -%3E %7B%0A                navController.navigate(R.id.dashboardFragment)%0A            %7D%0A navController.navigate(R.id.meetingsFragment)%0A            %7D%0A            R.id.nav_settings -%3E %7B%0A                navController.navigate(R.id.settingsFragment)%0A            %7D%0A
